name: Let Gooo
description:
Game submission for GMTK 2020 

The user has no control over the monster, can only fill out the stats for the monster. Once picked the monster is unleashed on the city and the user watches the monster wreak havoc through the news feed. The police and the army eventually show up and kill the monster and you repeat with more points to allocate to the monster.

Speed: Moving speed
Luck: Dodge chance
Intelligence: Detection radius
Magnitude: Size & Strength
Endurance: Health

By:

Igor Hatakeyama

Raheel Zubair
